passages.text:
Oh... I didn't imagine that you where so week.
Here, take this.
[[TAKE ->take]]
[sound of heart]
passages.name: Wh-what happend? I...I couldn't move

passages.text:
Now you can move, try to survive thist time.
You just have to run, is like in a game, W A S D you know?
[[...]]
passages.name: take

passages.text:
What I'm talking about?
You don't even remeber about yourself...
[[UPGRADE]]
[[Tutorial 2]]
passages.name: UPGRADE

passages.text:
Oh, you already died?
[[Wh-what happend? I...I couldn't move]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Oh no, here we are again.
[[But... There was no place to run...]]

links.name: But... There was no place to run...
links.link: But... There was no place to run...

passages.name: Tutorial 2

passages.text:
In some cases, you can not run. You HAVE to fight!
[[But how can I do this?]]
[[I don't want to hurt anyone!]]

links.name: But how can I do this?
links.link: But how can I do this?

links.name: I don't want to hurt anyone!
links.link: I don't want to hurt anyone!

passages.name: But... There was no place to run...

passages.text:
Here, It's to dangerous to go alone, so take this:
[[TAKE]]
passages.name: But how can I do this?

passages.text:
The life isn't an pacifist game where you can choose this.
You HAVE to hurt someone to stay alive.
[[TAKE]]
[[DON'T TAKE]]
passages.name: I don't want to hurt anyone!

passages.text:
Ok, a gun is self explanatory.
You just have to CLICK and shoot, it's really intuitive.
[[UPGRADE ->T3]]
passages.name: TAKE

passages.text:
They are just BUGS, please, take this already.
[[TAKE]]
[[DON'T TAKE -> d2]]
passages.name: DON'T TAKE

passages.text:
You are pissing me off.
Just take this and go!
[[TAKE]]
[[DON'T TAKE -> d3]]
passages.name: d2

passages.text:
You are leaving me with no choices...
[[TAKE]]
[[DON'T TAKE -> d4]]
passages.name: d3

passages.text:
Do-don't take
[[Uh??]]
passages.name: d4

passages.text:
Okay, okay, I will have to use my most powerfull weapon?
[[TAKE]]
[[What was that?]]
passages.name: Uh??

passages.text:
That what?
[[The different voice that spoked]]
passages.name: What was that?

passages.text:
Oh.. it must be some memory backing to you! What a greate notice!
[[Y-yeah, it must be]]
passages.name: The different voice that spoked

passages.text:
But for now, I have to tell you something
[[What?]]
passages.name: Y-yeah, it must be

passages.text:
Even that you don't remember, people that I care about, people that YOU care about are in danger, and only getting of from this lab you can help them.
[[But...]]
passages.name: What?

passages.text:
And the only way to do this, is by taking that gun and killing every bug that are killing this world.
So, please, for me and for the hole world.
Take that gun.
[[TAKE -> t2]]
[[DON'T TAKE -> d5]]
passages.name: But...

passages.text:
Okay, that is your position, but I will be here until you take this
[[TAKE -> t2]]
[[DON'T TAKE -> d6]]
passages.name: d5

passages.text:
...
[[TAKE -> t2]]
[[DON'T TAKE -> d6]]
passages.name: d6

passages.text:
Thank you.
[[What I have to do now? ->TAKE]]

links.name: What I have to do now?

passages.name: t2

passages.text: [[Turorial3]]
passages.name: T3

passages.text:
That was scary...
[[What was that? -> wwt2]]
passages.name: Turorial3

passages.text:
It must be part of the infection of the bugs.
The world is full of that things, please don't touch that.
[[But it was faster than me.]]

links.name: But it was faster than me.
links.link: But it was faster than me.

passages.name: wwt2

passages.text:
In that case, you just have to run faster right?
[[But how can I do that?]]

links.name: But how can I do that?
links.link: But how can I do that?

passages.name: But it was faster than me.

passages.text:
How would I know?
[[... -> ....]]
passages.name: But how can I do that?

passages.text:
Okay, Okay, have you ever saw any SPACE scyfi fiction?
[[space... what?]]

... How could I explain...
Imagine an SPACE ship...
[[Okay... I think I know what is that...]]

links.name: Okay... I think I know what is that...
links.link: Okay... I think I know what is that...

passages.name: space... what?

passages.text:
Well, when that SPACE ship have to cover much SPACE, they do something named hyper SPACE travel.
[[And how it helps me?]]
passages.name: Okay... I think I know what is that...

passages.text:
I don't know, discover by yourself.
[[UPGRADE -> Tutorial 4]]
passages.name: And how it helps me?

passages.text: [[Tutorial4]]
passages.name: Tutorial 4

passages.text:
Are you there?
[[Yeah, but I couldn't see anything]]

links.name: Yeah, but I couldn't see anything
links.link: Yeah, but I couldn't see anything

passages.name: Tutorial4

passages.text:
My light is like your gun, to use it, you just have do CLICK.
[[What? ]]
passages.name: Neeko...?

passages.text:
What do you mean?
[[It's like if I heard Neeko's voice]]
[[Oh, just forget]]

links.name: It's like if I heard Neeko's voice
links.link: It's like if I heard Neeko's voice

passages.name: But where is...? Doctor? What is going on??

passages.text:
It's a shame, I hoped it would be useful.
Anyway, go there and KILL some bugs.
[[UPGRADE ->END]]
passages.name: Nothing...

passages.text:
I see... I don't know what it means, but thank you for tell me that.
You are loyal.
[[UPGRADE ->END]]
passages.name: Something about the darkness

passages.text:
Me neither, you should, I don't know, shoot everywhere and try dash as faster as you can
[[You are right, I should've try this ->neeko]]
[[I don't know if it works... ->neeko]]

links.name: You are right, I should've try this
I don't know if it works...

passages.name: Yeah, but I couldn't see anything

passages.text:
Don't let the darkness grow whitin you.
Accept my light.
[[Neeko...?]]
passages.name: neeko

passages.text:
It must be another lapse of memory!
What did you hear?
[[Nothing...]]
[[Something about the darkness]]
passages.name: It's like if I heard Neeko's voice

passages.text:
But instead of kill the others, you bring light to the world.
That is the RIGHT CLICK.
[[Okay, I will try, but I have some questions for you]]

links.name: Okay, I will try, but I have some questions for you
links.link: Okay, I will try, but I have some questions for you

passages.name: What?

passages.text:
What are you whaiting for? Go on and kill some bugs
[[But where is...? Doctor? What is going on??]]

links.name: But where is...? Doctor? What is going on??
links.link: But where is...? Doctor? What is going on??

passages.name: Okay, I will try, but I have some questions for you

passages.text:
You are weird...
Don't waist my time, go there and kill those creatures already!
[[UPGRADE ->END]]
passages.name: Oh, just forget

passages.name: END
